snippet: John C. Liu, the city comptroller and a Democratic candidate for mayor, has raised the graduation speech to a high art, winning fans among the many audience members.
abstract: Trailside blog; John C Liu, city comptroller and a Democratic candidate for mayor, has raised graduation speeches to a high art; using occasions to offer a capsule version of his own years inside the New York City school system, Liu is winning fans among the many audience members he makes sure to congratulate, even those not old enough to vote.
lead_paragraph: John C. Liu, the city comptroller and a Democratic candidate for mayor, has raised the graduation speech to a high art, winning fans among the many audience members.
